question: Display navigation systems and communication systems used at Heathrow Airport.
sql_query1:
SELECT Navigation_Systems.TypeOfSystem
FROM Navigation_Systems
WHERE Navigation_Systems.Airport = "Heathrow"
UNION
SELECT Communication_Systems.TypeOfSystem
FROM Communication_Systems
WHERE Communication_Systems.Airport = "Heathrow"
sql_query2:
SELECT Navigation_Systems.TypeOfSystem
FROM Navigation_Systems
UNION
SELECT Communication_Systems.TypeOfSystem
FROM Communication_Systems
WHERE Communication_Systems.Airport = "Heathrow"
interpretation1: Can you show navigation and communication systems used at Heathrow Airport?
interpretation2: List all navigation systems and also display communication systems used at Heathrow Airport.
